examples: He was wearing a grey business suit.
Llevaba un traje gris de negocios.
He is dressed in a formal black suit.
Está vestido con un traje negro formal.
They won't let you into the restaurant without a suit and tie.
No te dejarán entrar al restaurante sin traje y corbata.
a two-/three-piece suit (= of two/three pieces of clothing)
un traje de dos / tres piezas (= de dos / tres piezas de ropa)
